channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 07/11/2023 INC#1628

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1628; 09:50PM; 131 W Av 43; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pNS4YD; #HighlandPark; A previously sustained and bandaged injury by the adult female resident initially suspected of having sustained a burn injury, proved not to be related to the fire. She declined further care. Two other persons later came forward with minor complaints following possible smoke exposure, and are being medically assessed by LAFD Paramedics at the scene. No other injuries reported. The fire, largely involving a shed behind the one story home and excessive outdoor storage with minor damage to the nearby residence, remains under active investigation. ; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E201 E202 E210 E212 E227 E3 E44 E47 E55 EA1 EM1 EM13 HR3 RA12 RA3 RA803 T1 T10 T12 T2 T27 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 07/11/2023 INC#1628

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1628; 09:03PM; 131 W Av 43; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pNS4YD; #HighlandPark; First arriving 40 LAFD personnel took just 26 minutes to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire within a one story home. One civilian (undetermined age / gender / condition / affiliation / circumstances) being treated by LAFD Paramedics for burn injury. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E201 E202 E210 E212 E227 E3 E44 E47 E55 EA1 EM1 EM13 HR3 RA12 RA3 RA803 T1 T10 T12 T2 T27 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1628; 08:37PM; 133 W Av 44; MAP: https://bit.ly/43lS143; #HighlandPark; PRELIM: One story home to the rear of the property, well involved with fire.; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E12 E201 E44 RA12 T1; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#1297; 06:04PM; 5600 N Woodley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JTkDLa; #SepulvedaBasin; Despite hot weather and a steady 7 mph wind from the south, a well-coordinated LAFD ground and air response with the assistance of Park Rangers, held flames to three (3) acres of grass and brush on the west side of Woodley Avenue north of Burbank Boulevard. No injury. No structures. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC14 E100 E239 E288 E290 E39 E81 E83 E88 E90 EM14 H2 H4 H7 HA2 HA4 HA7 RA88 RA90 T39 T88 T90 WT88 + Park Rangers; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1297; 05:15PM; 5600 N Woodley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JTkDLa; #SepulvedaBasin; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a grass fire extending into brush on the west side of Woodley Avenue north of Burbank Boulevard. No structure threat.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC14 E100 E239 E288 E290 E39 E81 E83 E88 E90 EM14 H2 H4 H7 HA2 HA4 HA7 RA88 RA90 T39 T88 T90 WT88; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#1066; 04:15PM; SB 5 Fwy transition to SB 110 Parkway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jdG0tf; #ElysianPark; LAFD ground and air responders, with the assistance of City Park Rangers and a helicopter from the Los Angeles County Fire Department responding in Automatic Aid, have fully extinguished the vehicle fire, and confined fire to approximately one (1) acre of heavy brush. No injury. No structure damage. No evacuation. LAFD crews will remain in the vicinity handling full extinguishment and mop up until 7:30 PM, and will work with CHP and Caltrans to reopen southbound lanes of the 110 Parkway south of the Golden State (I-5) Freeway as soon as possible. The cause of the vehicle fire has yet to be determined.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 CW3A E1 E12 E16 E20 E201 E202 E203 E212 E220 E250 E290 E3 E4 E44 E56 E90 EM1 H2 H4 H7 HA2 HA4 HA7 HT3 HU59 RA1 RI200 T1 T2 T20 T3 T50 T90 WT88; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Brush Fire; INC#1066; 03:39PM; SB 5 Fwy transition to SB 110 Parkway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jdG0tf; #ElysianPark; Despite a mild wind, LAFD responders have extinguished the vehicle fire, and continue to flank flames which have extended uphill from the Parkway (aka Pasadena Freeway) to consume approximately one (1) acre of heavy brush, as flames approach a fire road above. No structures are currently threatened.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E20 E201 E202 E203 E212 E220 E250 E290 E4 E44 E56 E90 EM1 H2 H4 H7 HA2 HA4 HA7 HT3 RA1 T1 T2 T20 T3 T50 T90 WT88; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1066; 03:05PM; SB 5 Fwy transition to SB 110 Parkway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jdG0tf; #ElysianPark; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a well involved vehicle fire, with flames extending uphill to approximately one (1) acre of heavy brush. Mild wind. Anticipated closure of one or more lanes of SB 110 Parkway south of 5 Fwy until LAFD operations are complete.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E20 E201 E202 E203 E212 E220 E250 E290 E4 E44 E56 EM1 H2 H4 H7 HA2 HA4 HA7 RA1 T1 T2 T20 T3 T50 T90 ; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update #BrownsFire Brush Fire; INC#1857; 11:30PM; Browns Canyon / Santa Susana Mountains; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PP4ZnE; #Chatsworth; As this active wildfire in Browns Canyon (Chatsworth west of Porter Ranch) known as the #BrownsFire is entirely in Los Angeles County Fire Department jurisdiction, LAFD is now in a supporting role. The Los Angeles County Fire Department (LACoFD) will therefore be the official source of ongoing information regarding this fire.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 AR1 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E106 E107 E18 E28 E287 E290 E70 E72 E8 E87 E90 EM15 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 T87 T90 WT77 + LACoFD + VCFD; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1857; 10:54PM; Browns Canyon / Santa Susana Mountains; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PP4ZnE; #Chatsworth; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with the Los Angeles County and Ventura County Fire Departments in Automatic Aid to an Active Brush Fire estimated at 2-3 acres in a Mutual Threat Zone in the Santa Susana Mountains.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E106 E107 E18 E28 E287 E290 E70 E8 E87 E90 EM15 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 T87 T90 WT77 + LACoFD + VCFD; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey
